original_text: Now Jesus had not yet come into the village, but was still in the place where Martha had met him.
korean_text: 예수는 아직 마을로 들어오지 아니하시고 마르다가 맞이했던 곳에 그대로 계시더라

sentences.original_text: Now Jesus had not yet come into the village
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님은 아직 마을에 들어오지 않으셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: but was still in the place
